inclusion.criterion: Histologically-confirmed operable ER+ and/or PR+ invasive breast cancer or ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Postmenopausal status defined as cessation of menses for >1 year or FSH > 20 mIU/mL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histologically-confirmed operable ER+ and/or PR+ invasive breast cancer or ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS), who undergo core needle biopsy followed by surgical excision at least 2 weeks after enrollment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with other investigational drugs within 6 months of study entry
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.
